content.rendered:
Healthcare

Healthcare

Promoting digital innovation & excellence in the healthcare industry

Healthcare software development is vital for modern healthcare systems. With advancing technology, providers rely on software solutions to streamline operations, improve patient care, and boost outcomes. NeST Digital offers a range of healthcare software solutions, from patient monitoring to virtual reality simulations for medical training.

These solutions enhance communication, provide real-time patient information, and increase engagement. Embrace the power of technology in healthcare with NeST Digital!

Offerings

DEVICE DEVELOPMENT We offer services in device design, firmware and driver development, IoT infrastructure design and integration, and security integration. We specialize in scalable IoT infrastructure design, wireless technology stack integration, and enterprise integration.

Our team also handles monitoring and management of infrastructure for scalability, versioning, patches, and security. We provide secure adapters to interface with cloud endpoints and integrate security measures using OpenSSL and WolfSSL. Our services include integrating Wi-Fi WPA Enterprise security, NFC, RFID, Bluetooth, and Wi-Fi on the device side. DIGITAL TECHNOLOGY We help in upgrading the existing software suits of customers by giving them a digital experience (digital front-end). This is done by developing the custom middleware as well as the intuitive mobile and web UI experience.

Also, customers collaborate with us to identify, define, develop, test, scale & deploy and improve the digital solutions making use of our expertise in IIoT, AI/DL/ML, AR/VR and Big Data capabilities. Customers also collaborate with us to build new revenue streams through software- as-a-service business models of digital technologies. IMAGING SOLUTIONS We offer modality application development for X-Ray, US & MR, including advanced image processors, measurement capabilities, and structural dose reports. Our services include image enhancements, filter implementation, and algorithm implementation, as well as X-ray calibration and hardware self-servicing features.

Additionally, we provide a C-ARM dual monitor image viewer, responsive multi-touch GUI applications, and intelligent annotation capabilities. Our services also include post-processing, quick annotation support, USB print/export, and DICOM interoperability. INTEROPERABILITY We focus on seamless healthcare system integration using IHE profiles, enabling efficient cross-enterprise data sharing and clinical exchange.

Our expertise includes hospital system interface development for advanced data management. We excel in migrating and porting patient data securely, integrating legacy radiology systems, and implementing Tele-Medicine & Tele-Radiology solutions for real-time remote access to medical information. Trust our skilled resources for cutting-edge technology and efficient patient care.

Platforms & Solutions

Clinical Patient Monitoring Platform

As part of our IOT platform solutions, we have developed a Clinical Patient Monitoring system, which sends patients’ vital information from various patient monitoring devices to the Cloud using an IOT Edge interface.

Platform provides Healthcare Professionals with an intuitive interface for monitoring patient vitals (Heart Rate, Blood Pressure, Oxygen, etc.) and enables them to make informed decisions or quickly respond to an emergency.

Clinical Power Tool Management Solution

Our solution involved building a web and mobile-based Clinical Power Tool Management System for an IOT-enabled Surgical Power Tool.

The platform provided a dashboard to monitor and analyze the performance indicators of the Clinical Power Tool and coordinate the Tool’s service and maintenance workflow.

Success Stories

Anesthesia Safety ECU Unit

Advanced infusion platform for large volume pump and Syringe pumps

ECG Device Revamp and Gateway Integration
